extendedInfo.description: 100 People Words for Babies & Toddlers is a speech and vocabulary learning game for preschool children aged between 6 months and 4 years old. This early learning app is the perfect way to introduce your child to new words and grow thier vocabulary. Each 100 words app contains colourful graphics, energetic sounds, and cute animations. It is a great way to keep your little one entertained whilst learning new words. What's new: - Choose between American English and British English Word categories include: - Family - Professions - Uniforms - Sports - Faces - Performers - Hobbies - Having fun - Food and drink - Clothes - Movement - Fancy If you like this app please leave a review and try our other 100 series apps. - 100 Words for Babies & Toddlers - 100 Animal Words for Babies & Toddlers - 100 Vehicles for Babies & Toddlers Support: If you have any problems please contact us at: support@kizzuapps.comDesigned for:Kids games for 1 year oldKids games for 2 years oldKids games for 3 years oldKids games for 4 years old
